Columns.Description: The type of activity for which this checkpoint was reported.
Columns.Name: ActivityType

Columns.Description: The correlation Id for the activity.
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: The user name for the activity associated with the checkpoint.
Columns.Name: UserName

Columns.Description: The component that emitted the checkpoint.
Columns.Name: Source

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
